stem: What is the foundational process at the base of Google's Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) ?
options/0/rationale: Before you can take any of the other actions, you must first be monitoring the system.
options/1/rationale: I recommend reviewing the lectures in this module.

stem: Google Cloud’s operations suite integrates several technologies, including monitoring, logging, error reporting, and debugging that are commonly implemented in other environments as separate solutions using separate products. What are key benefits of integration of these services?
options/0/title: Detailed control over the connections between the technologies
options/0/rationale: I recommend reviewing the lectures in this module.
options/1/title: Ability to replace one tool with another from a different vendor
options/1/rationale: That's incorrect. I recommend going back to the lectures of this module to review this concept.
options/2/title: Better for Google Cloud only so long as you don't need to monitor other applications or clouds
options/2/rationale: That is not the right answer. Please go back and review the lectures in this module.
options/3/title: Reduces overhead, reduces noise, streamlines use, and fixes problems faster
options/3/rationale: Integration with Google Cloud’s operations suite streamlines and unifies these traditionally independent services, making it much easier to establish procedures around them and to use them in continuous ways.

stem: What is the purpose of the Cloud Trace service?
options/0/rationale: I recommend reviewing the lectures in this module.
options/1/title: Reporting on Google Cloud system errors.
options/1/rationale: That's incorrect. I recommend going back to the lectures of this module to review this concept.
options/2/title: Reporting on Google Cloud resource consumption as part of managing performance.
options/2/rationale: That is not the right answer. Please go back and review the lectures in this module.
options/3/title: Reporting on latency as part of managing performance.
options/3/rationale: Cloud Trace provides latency sampling and reporting for Google App Engine, Google HTTP(S) load balancers, and applications instrumented with the Cloud Trace SDKs. Reporting includes per-URL statistics and latency distributions.
